lines.text:
[to Leoni]
Do you really want little Napiers growing inside you?
Charles Napier! I cannot allow you to sleep with my wife. I don't like it. It makes me feel funny in my head.
You don't know Leoni! She married me to achieve insecurity and you're trying to take it away from her. She won't thank you for that!
You know, I believe my mental condition is extremely illegal.
You know, violence has a kind of dignity in a loving man. And I'm full of love. I shall punish you with love. Now where would you like love? In between your eyes or your teeth?

[places skeleton on bed]
Man is born to sorrow...
Saw me old ma yesterday.
And how is she?
She refuses to de-Stalinise...
I'll never get my peace in this world. And I don't believe in the next.

[upon unexpectedly finding Morgan in her house]
Morgan!... You told me you were going to stay in Greece until after the divorce. You AGREED to that, Morgan.
I got back yesterday...
I gave you an ENORMOUS check, and you promised!
Ah, nothing but ruins, Greece. YOU got me all excited about going there. And it wasn't exciting. I was there, and suddenly realized, I ought to be here, stop you from ruining your life.

[quite exasperated]
Oh, you...!
Insecurity has made you very cunning - I'd say 'devious' if I didn't love you.
You said you'd stay away until all this was over...

[loudly cutting her off]
... until you got me neatly written off by the Jew legal processes of the State. No. I've thought it over. I've decided to come back for you. And what'd you mean by having our house torn to bits in my absence?
"MY" house. I'm having it converted into flats. I'm going to make THOUSANDS out of it.
Nothing in this world seems to live up to my best fantasies, except you.
I mean what *is* there in Greece?
Argh, nothing but ruins, Greece. You'd got me all excited about going there.
I went to see a psychiatrist today...
If it's more money you want, there's twenty quid in my bag.
...He was fat, and extremely furry. Furry 'ands, furry suit... furry...
Where has love got me? Where has gentleness got me? You know violence has a kind of dignity in a loving man. And I'm full of love.

[to Morgan]
Look at you! Found yourself a rich woman, live in luxury on your backside...

[to Morgan]
Your dad was onto you the day he drowned those kittens.
There's no cause for alarm. Gorillas are good. They're big, but they're good.

[speaking of "his" car]
It is an island of sanity.
You ought to watch it!
I know, but where is "it"?
Is it the chromosomes, do you think, or is it England?
The function of the nursery in marriage is to be occupied by children, not by the husband and wife.
I've gone all *furry*!
